channel.title: Ctrl+Alt+Del (three-finger salute) action
channel.description:
**Ctrl+Alt+Del** (sometimes called the "[three-finger salute](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Control-Alt-Delete)"):
On Windows, the three-finger does something useful. Noways, shows a menu:
* Lock * Switch user * Sign out * Change a password * Task manager * Cancel
On Qubes, simply activates the screen lock.
On Kicksecure, we could also provide similar options such as:
* Task manager * Lock * Regular shutdown * Emergency shutdown
